sentence.Network_en: Many groups can be added by nucleophilic substitution on a diazonium salt.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多基团可通过向得自胶的重氮盐作亲核取代而加以导入.

sentence.Network_en: Most direct substitution of groups bound to an aromatic nucleus is limited to diazonium salts.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数连于芳核能被直接取代的基团仅限于重氮盐.

sentence.Network_en: The market demand and prospect diazonium borofluoride was suggested.
sentence.Network_cn: 对市场需求和前景进行了预测.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: coined in German from diazo- (indicating the presence of two nitrogen atoms) + the suffix -onium (from ammonium)

means.word_mean: 1. the univalent cation R-N:N- (where R is an aromatic hydrocarbon); found in salts that are used in manufacturing azo dyes
